DUG 30 WSW SAD 45 NW SAD 35 S SOW 30 WSW GNT GNT ABQ 30 S ABQ 25 NNE
TCS 40 NNE SVC SVC 45 S DMN.

DTW 10 WSW BUF BUF 30 S BUF 20 SE CLE 35 N MFD 45 SE DTW.
